title: Virgo

nouns: Sixth astrological sign in the zodiac
The sixth sign of the zodiac; the sun is in this sign from about August 23 to September 22
Someone with a Virgo star sign
Virgo is the sixth astrological sign in the Zodiac.
The constellation and star sign Virgo.

description: The Virgo astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents a Maiden.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's Virgo emoji presents a graceful depiction of the zodiac sign, featuring a stylized figure with a serene expression and flowing drapery, rendered with the characteristic smooth gradients and subtle 3D shading found on Apple devices. The design embodies a sense of meticulousness and calm, reflecting the sign's association with order and service. This emoji is ideal for expressing analytical thoughts, a desire for perfection, or celebrating the Virgo season with a touch of celestial elegance, all brought to life with Apple's refined aesthetic.
